Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class GamePreferences

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.GamePreferences
public class GamePreferences extends Object
Manages the persistent game settings such as music volume and key bindings. This class wraps LibGDX's Preferences system and provides typed getter and setter methods for all configurable options. All changes are immediately saved using prefs.flush().

  • Field Details

    • voiceEnabled

      public static boolean voiceEnabled

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePreferences

      public GamePreferences()
      Creates a new GamePreferences instance and loads saved settings from disk. If no settings file exists yet, it will be created with default values. Loads the sound effects toggle state so it persists between sessions.

  • Method Details

    • getMusicVolume

      public float getMusicVolume()
      Gets the saved background music volume level.
      Returns:
      volume as a float between 0.0 (silent) and 1.0 (full volume), defaults to 0.5

    • setMusicVolume

      public void setMusicVolume(float volume)
      Sets and saves the background music volume. Change takes effect immediately and is saved to disk.
      Parameters:
      volume - the new volume level (typically 0.0 to 1.0)
